attributes.action: Force financial institutions to rename “Credit Cards” to “Debt Cards”.
attributes.background: We call upon the government to force financial services companies to call debt what it really is, “Debt”. “Credit” is often marketed in such a way that it doesn’t feel like debt. With unsecured debt growing at a dangerous rate, it is important people are more aware of what they’re getting into.

rejection.details:
The regulation of credit cards is the responsibility of the independent regulator, the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). 

You can find out more about what the FCA is doing to address problem debt on credit cards here: 

https://www.fca.org.uk/publication/market-studies/ms14-6-3-credit-card-market-study-final-findings-report.pdf
